sentences.en: a machine that simulates conditions in space
sentences.cn: 一台模拟太空环境的机器

sentences.en: A numerical method to simulate nonlinear fluid - rigid structure interaction problems is developed.
sentences.cn: 给出了一种模拟非线性流体 - 刚体结构相互作用问题的数值方法.

sentences.en: A sheet of metal was shaken to simulate the noise of thunder.
sentences.cn: 猛力抖动金属片以模仿雷声.

sentences.en: A value of 1 will only simulate your own airplane.
sentences.cn: 设置为1,会只模拟出一架飞机.

sentences.en: Cellular automata is a model that can simulate complex structure and process.
sentences.cn: 摘要元胞自动机是可模拟复杂结构和过程的模型.

sentences.en: For once he must simulate when it left a taste in his mouth.
sentences.cn: 这一次他必须装出无动于衷的样子,这使他心里感到苦涩.

sentences.en: He found it impossible to simulate grief.
sentences.cn: 他无法装出悲伤的样子。

sentences.en: He shook a sheet of metal to simulate the noise of thunder.
sentences.cn: 他摇动一块金属薄片来模拟雷声.

sentences.en: How to simulate the anchoring effect of bolts is discussed.
sentences.cn: 探讨了如何在计算中考虑锚杆的锚固效应.

sentences.en: I tried to simulate surprise at the news.
sentences.cn: 听到这个消息后，我竭力装出一副吃惊的样子。

sentences.en: Interviews can be simulated in the classroom.
sentences.cn: 可以在教室里模拟面试。

sentences.en: It can simulate, or imitate different measurements by electronic means.
sentences.cn: 它能够利用电子手段来模拟或者仿真不同的测量值.

sentences.en: Many believe artificial soils do not simulate natural soils.
sentences.cn: 许多人相信人造土并不像天然土.

sentences.en: Smoke was used to simulate steam coming from a smashed radiator.
sentences.cn: 用烟来模拟从撞碎的散热器中冒出的蒸气。

sentences.en: Suitable mathematical models are already available to simulate the behavior of simple types of structures.
sentences.cn: 现在已有适当的数学模型来模拟简单结构物的性能.

sentences.en: The game of deception was up with Drouet. He did not try to simulate indifference further.
sentences.cn: 杜洛埃放弃了对她掩饰自己的思想的打算, 他不想再装出无所谓的神气了.

sentences.en: The wood had been painted to simulate stone.
sentences.cn: 木头上刷了漆以看起来像块石头。

trans.tran_en: to make or produce something that is not real but has the appearance or feeling of being real

trans.tran_cn: 假装，冒充，模仿，模拟，[生]拟态
trans.tran_en: to make or produce something that is not real but has the appearance or feeling of being real
